mapper.insert: insert into table_reply (bno, reply, replyer) values (#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update table_reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = now() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate from table_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
